pullrequest.title: Generate a single polyline walkway path collision

content.raw:
With decades of experience in software I know the effort by the entire competition software team has been amazing. I may complain (ME!!??) at certain points but know exactly what you are going through. Most of my work was in embedded systems. The software we produced was always 'late'. The major reason we were 'late' was the hardware was always late. But nobody seemed to correlate that with why the software got delayed. Not to mention all the simple, one-off software I had to write to demonstrate to the hardware guys where that line that was supposed to be high was actually low. "Fix it in software" was the response. Then in next version of the hardware they would fix it. Now the software had to determine the version of hardware to do the right thing.

Hope some of you will be at JSC at the end of the month. Would like to shake your hand or even buy you a libation. 
This reminds me of those situations. Both teams doing their best but it's the nature of the beast.
